# File vendor/riddle/lib/riddle/configuration/index.rb, line 26
      def initialize(name, *sources)
        @name                     = name
        @sources                  = sources
        @morphologies             = []
        @stopword_files           = []
        @wordform_files           = []
        @exception_files          = []
        @ignore_characters        = []
        @prefix_field_names       = []
        @infix_field_names        = []
        @ngram_characters         = []
        @phrase_boundaries        = []
        @html_remove_element_tags = []
      end
